mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_s_term_debt where code = #{_parameter} and delete_flag="N"
mapper.insert: insert into tb_s_term_debt(no, code, name, major_code, debt_amount, repay_bal, repay_way, debt_date, exp_date, int_rate, int_pay_way, mgr, mgr_call, bank_code, deposit_no, voucher_no, delete_flag,insert_id, insert_date, update_id, update_date) values (null, #{code }, #{name }, #{majorCode}, ${debtAmount }, ${debtAmount }, #{repayWay }, #{debtDate}, #{expDate}, ${intRate }, #{intPayWay }, #{mgr }, #{mgrCall }, #{bankCode }, #{depositNo }, ${voucherNo}, 'N', #{insertId }, now(), null, null)
mapper.update: update tb_s_term_debt set code=#{code}, name=#{name}, major_code=#{majorCode}, debt_amount=${debtAmount}, repay_way=#{repayWay}, debt_date=now(), exp_date=now(), int_rate=${intRate}, int_pay_way=#{intPayWay}, mgr=#{mgr }, mgr_call=#{mgrCall}, bank_code=#{bankCode}, deposit_no=#{depositNo}, update_id=#{updateId}, update_date=now() where no=${no }

update tb_s_term_debt set delete_flag = "Y" where no IN
${vo.no}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_repay(no, debt_no, code, pay_princ, int_amount, pay_date, debt_type, voucher_no, delete_flag, insert_id, insert_date) values(null, ${debtNo}, #{code}, ${payPrinc}, ${intAmount}, #{payDate}, "S", ${voucherNo}, "N", #{insertId}, now())
mapper.select: select * from tb_repay where debt_no=${_parameter} and debt_type="S"

select code, repay_bal, case when repay_way = "E" then exp_date when repay_way = "Y" then concat(date_format(now(), "%Y-"), date_format(debt_date, "%m-%d")) when repay_way="M" then concat(date_format(now(), "%Y-%m-"), date_format(debt_date, "%d")) end as repayDue from tb_s_term_debt where repay_comple_flag = "N" and (${curDay} <= day(debt_date) and ${sunDay} >= day(debt_date) and (repay_way="Y" and year(debt_date) < ${curYear} and month(debt_date) = ${curMonth}) or (repay_way="M" and date_format(debt_date, "%Y%m") <> date_format(now(), "%Y%m"))) or repay_way="E" and #{today} <= exp_date and exp_date <= #{dateOfSunday}
select year(debt_date) "year", sum(debt_amount) "sum" from tb_s_term_debt group by year(debt_date)
